article_title: 5 Insights From Aetna General Counsel William Casazza
article_text:
5 Insights From Aetna General Counsel William Casazza

Law360, New York (May 15, 2014, 6:15 PM ET) -- William J. Casazza is executive vice president and general counsel of Aetna Inc., a Fortune 100 heath care company. He also is a member of the company’s management executive committee. As general counsel, he is responsible for Aetna’s legal, regulatory and compliance affairs worldwide.



Casazza has been with Aetna for more than 20 years and has served as general counsel since 2005. Prior to that, he was with Sullivan & Cromwell LLP in New York and London, and prior to that he was a CPA with...

To view the full article, register now.

article_metadata.description: We have a strong law department and pride ourselves on doing the hard work in-house. So when we go outside, it is usually for a special item where the stakes are high. It is a rifle, not shotgun, approach, and close doesn’t count, says William Casazza, executive vice president and general counsel of Aetna Inc.
